verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 1:8
verses.text: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia, but also in every place your faith to God-ward is spread abroad; so that we need not to speak any thing.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 1:9
verses.text: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you, and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God;

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 1:10
verses.text: And to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead, even Jesus, which delivered us from the wrath to come.
